CLIENT_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A client access token, obtained by exchanging your client id and client secret for a token via an HTTP request to publiq's authorization server. See the [authentication docs about client access tokens](https://publiq.stoplight.io/docs/authentication/docs/client-access-token.md) for more info.

Unauthorized.description:
Unauthorized. Your request is missing the required credentials to authenticate. See the Authentication documentation for more info.

* type: https://api.publiq.be/probs/auth/unauthorized
* detail: might contain a developer-readable explanation of the reason

Forbidden.description:
Forbidden. Your request was successfully authenticated but you do not have permission to perform this particular request.

* type: https://api.publiq.be/probs/auth/forbidden
* detail: might contain a developer-readable explanation of the reason

value.title: Forbidden
value.detail: user must be admin of organizer abcd1234

400.description:
Bad Request. Possbile error types:

* https://api.publiq.be/probs/body/invalid-data (if numberOfVouchers is not within its boundaries)

The detail property might include more information for the client developer.

post.description:
Generate a list of vouchers for a partner. The partner is implied by the client access token.
 
<!-- theme: warning -->

> **Warning**: This API generates vouchers and marks them as sold in the museumPASSmusees system. This will be invoiced to the partner.

The caller of this request must have the PARTNER role for a specific partner.

numberOfVouchers.description: The total number of vouchers to generate
